name: CVE-2010-1284
description: Adobe Shockwave Player before 11.5.7.609 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2010-1286, CVE-2010-1287, CVE-2010-1289, CVE-2010-1290, and CVE-2010-1291.
